message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth noting that the product has a significant personal value to me. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that is slightly above its intrinsic value of $8,000 but well below its market value. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.
